_comment: Ship + Captain combo synergies. Hidden from UI until discovered in-game. Effects are small stat nudges (applied as flat bonuses). Keys are 'ship_id+captain_id'.

scout+captain_1.name: Precision Strike
scout+captain_1.description: Nimble frame lets overdrive target weak points.
scout+captain_1.discovered_text: Something clicks between the scout's agile frame and your combat instincts...

scout+captain_2.name: Evasive Maneuvers
scout+captain_2.description: Light hull makes the most of defensive reflexes.
scout+captain_2.discovered_text: The scout weaves naturally around incoming fire under your careful hand...

scout+captain_3.name: Scavenger's Eye
scout+captain_3.description: A fast ship with a keen eye misses nothing.
scout+captain_3.discovered_text: At these speeds, your trained eye catches every glint of salvage...

interceptor+captain_1.name: Blitz Protocol
interceptor+captain_1.discovered_text: The interceptor's speed turns your attacks into a relentless barrage...

interceptor+captain_2.name: Crash Barrier
interceptor+captain_2.description: Reckless speed backed by unbreakable defense.
interceptor+captain_2.discovered_text: The interceptor's shields flare brighter when flying at full throttle...

interceptor+captain_3.name: Hyperscanner
interceptor+captain_3.discovered_text: At interceptor speeds, your scanner array covers twice the ground...

fortress+captain_1.name: Siege Mode
fortress+captain_1.description: A heavy platform makes every shot count.
fortress+captain_1.discovered_text: The fortress's massive frame absorbs recoil, letting you fire with devastating precision...

fortress+captain_2.name: Immovable Object
fortress+captain_2.description: Maximum armor on maximum hull. Nothing gets through.
fortress+captain_2.discovered_text: The fortress becomes nearly indestructible under your defensive mastery...

fortress+captain_3.name: Command Center
fortress+captain_3.description: A floating base of operations with unmatched tactical awareness.
fortress+captain_3.discovered_text: With this much room to work, your command center pulls in resources from every direction...
